page.title: 18Mobile Homes near Longdon
page.content: The {Three Counties Mobile Home park will soon have{35 dwellings.}These are {transported}to and {sited on prepared {concrete bases. }All{construction }is with{insulated materials. The homes are fully furnished and centrally heated. The area is well laid out and Patios and flower beds abound. The owners pay a {ground rent }for maintainance of{roads and services. { Children under 14 }years of age are {not allowed}and{pets}are{discouraged. These homes are spacious,and comfort- able and are a{fraction of the cost}of a comparable{bungalow. { Car ownership is vital} as no buses pass the site. The local doctors leave repeat prescriptions at the camp shop. The residents like the peace of the countryside and are mostly retired.
